articles.author: Kayla Williams
articles.text:
October is National Breast Cancer Awareness month. In observance of the awareness effort, and in support of all breast cancer patients who are battling for their life or their health, here are the best strains for alleviating the three most common treatment side effects: nausea, lack of appetite, and fatigue.




 
Verde Electric is a hybrid cannabis strain known for its smooth delivery and long-lasting effects. It is best used for nausea, pain relief, and regulating digestion.


 
Bordering on sedative, Kush Berry is a great nighttime option for nausea relief as well as other mental ailments like stress, anxiety, and depression.


 
Useful for both pain and nausea, this Afghanica hybrid offers potent sativa and indica effects.


 
OG Wreck is a potent hybrid that's a great nighttime strain for nausea and pain, offering physical and psychoactive relief.


 
Armageddon packs a double punch with powerful mind and body effects that are optimal for nausea relief, and is a great choice for dinner with friends before a relaxing evening.

Can't find the above strains in your area? Our Strain and Products Explorer allows you to filter results based on effects and medical usage, so you can check out other cannabis strains that help with nausea.
 
 
 





 
Looking for daytime pain and nausea relief that will also whet your appetite? This OCD sativa does it all, but be cautious: it can increase anxiety.


 
Optimal for treating nausea and lack of appetite, the balanced hybrid known as Russian Rocket Fuel is also an effective mood lifter and great for daytime use.


 
Known best for treating anxiety, this high-quality hybrid Snoop's Dream is well-balanced between cerebral and physical effects and will relieve nausea and lack of appetite.


 
Tangie is a high-rated hybrid that's effective in treating nausea and increasing appetite, and is favored for its euphoric, energetic, and relaxing effects. 

Check out some other cannabis strains that help with stimulating appetite.
 
 
 






Specialized in treating fatigue but also useful for insomnia and pain relief, this Master Yoda hybrid tends toward indica effects but also offers a mellow sativa buzz.
 


Here are some other cannabis strains that help counteract fatigue.
 
 
 
image sources: nausea, lack of appetite,  fatigue
articles.title: 10 Great Cannabis Strains for Breast Cancer Patients

description: Verde Electric is one of those strains that is noted for its smooth, unique taste. Bred from a mix of Durban Poison, Platinum OG and Sherbert genes, this strain has gained a following in the medical community for treating pain and digestive issues. The lime green buds should be light, airy and have a nice crystal coat. The buzz is relaxing, but its near 50/50 hybrid mix has enough of an energy jolt to make Verde Electric a choice that works for many both days and nights.
descriptionPlain: Verde Electric is one of those strains that is noted for its smooth, unique taste. Bred from a mix of Durban Poison, Platinum OG and Sherbert genes, this strain has gained a following in the medical community for treating pain and digestive issues. The lime green buds should be light, airy and have a nice crystal coat. The buzz is relaxing, but its near 50/50 hybrid mix has enough of an energy jolt to make Verde Electric a choice that works for many both days and nights.

highlightedReviews.text: Verde Electric is a new type of Girl Scout Cookie. Similar to the Purple Cookie. But with more of a Cherry Pie/ Og/ Durban Poison mix that looks/ tastes amazing. I'm from the bay and know GSC. This hybrid is an overall balanced high that lasts a very long time and is close to the top of my list of buds. Unlike the Purple GSC, Verde Electric doesn't make you as thirsty. Love to medicate and socialize on it. No paranoia or fatigue. Wets the appetite and gets you a little thirsty.

I didn't think I'd like this strain as much as I do, I kept hearing mention of there being a cookie strain in it. Cookie strains don't usually work for me.  
It has a really awesome head buzz, the kind of stoned feeling I'm usually after to treat my stress.
I got a half gram of shatter by Canamo concentrates 74% THC (for an amazing deal, fifteen smackeroos tax incl.) 
I'm glad I got to try this strain in concentrate form it made it that much better. I'm actually sad I ran out. 
Great for any time of the day, I can function if I wake and bake I can still function or if I'm kept up late and need something to help me sleep this works great

name: Verde Electric
